page.description: A list sub-form properties with examples included.

case.title: Primary Table
case.description: The name of the table to which the parent form is bound.

case.title: Form Layout
case.description: The name of the other form to display.

case.title: Form by Expression
case.description: An expression that selects another form to display.

case.title: Read Only
case.description: Whether the sub-form is read only.

case.title: Always on Top
case.description: When checked the control is always on the top-most level of the form layout. No other form elements will over lap it.

case.title: Tab Stop
case.description: Enables or disables the ability to tab to the sub-form.

case.title: Disable
case.description: Enables or disables the tabbed control.

case.title: Left
case.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control.

case.title: Top
case.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width of the control.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height of the control.
